name: Website Redesign
description: Complete redesign of the corporate website including new branding, responsive layouts, and improved accessibility compliance.

name: Mobile App MVP
description: Build a minimum viable product for a personal finance tracking mobile application with budgeting and expense categorization.

name: Data Migration & Legacy System Decommissioning Project for Enterprise Resource Planning
description: Migrate 12 years of transactional data from on-premise SQL Server to cloud-hosted PostgreSQL and decommission legacy ERP modules.

name: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with inventory management, payment processing, and real-time order tracking.

name: Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time analytics dashboard for monitoring KPIs, user engagement metrics, and revenue trends with interactive charts.

name: CRM Integration
description: Integrate Salesforce CRM with internal project management and invoicing systems via REST APIs.

name: Cloud Infrastructure Setup
description: Design and provision AWS infrastructure including VPC, ECS clusters, RDS instances, and CI/CD pipelines with Terraform.

name: Brand Identity Refresh
description: Comprehensive brand refresh including new logo, color palette, typography system, and brand guidelines document.

name: API Gateway
description: Centralized API gateway with rate limiting, authentication, request routing, and monitoring for microservices architecture.
